reviews.review_msg: A very challenging prof, not for the faint of heart. Some previous reviews had the right words: arrogant, cold, pompous. But his reading lists are great and he really knows what he's talking about. Only take his class if you're really prepared for a challenge.

"lets take literally a 5 min break" He plays favorites and decides that reading many novels isnt enough,and assigns other readings to make matters worse! Makes you do outside research if u dont speak up in class CLASS PARTICIPATION is a BIG ONE!
